item.title: Rooster Fighter Confirms Anime Adaptation with First Trailer
item.description: ShÅ« Sakuratani’s action-comedy manga ‘Rooster Fighter’ is officially getting an anime adaptation. The first trailer and new key visual were unveiled on the official site and at Anime Expo 2025.
